mapper.insert: INSERT INTO site_notification ( notification_id, notification_type, target_site_code, content, champion_name, game_create_dt, game_mode_name ) VALUES ( #{notificationId}, #{notificationType}, #{targetSiteCode}, #{content}, #{championName}, #{gameCreateDt}, #{gameModeName} )
mapper.select: SELECT notification_seq, notification_id, notification_type, target_site_code, content, read_yn, read_dt, reg_dt, champion_name, game_create_dt, game_mode_name FROM site_notification WHERE target_site_code = #{targetSiteCode} AND reg_dt >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' ORDER BY notification_seq desc LIMIT 10
